sense.def:
Izraz
scarcely
pomeni, da je nekaj ravno še res.

seg.quote: I can scarcely remember what we ate.
...a very young man, scarcely more than a boy.

sense.def:
Izraz
scarcely
lahko uporabimo ironično, kadar želimo poudariti, da nekaj zanesljivo ni res.

seg.quote: There could scarcely be a less promising environment for children.

sense.def:
Kadar rečemo
scarcely had one thing happened when something else happened
, hočemo reči, da je prvemu dogodku zelo hitro sledil še drugi.

seg.quote: Scarcely had the car drawn to a halt when armed police surrounded it.
